Jared Rulison

Software Engineer and Musician

Hi!

I'm Jared. I'm studying Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) major at UC Berkeley. I like making things, challenging problems, algorithms, and Super Smash Bros.

I'm also a singer, guitarist, pianist, and amateur musicologist. You can find my music blog, as well as my favorite bands, here! More words for the sake of testing the padding.

You can find CS stuff I've done here and my resume here.

About This Site

This site was thrown together with Jekyll, a static blog generator, and styled with Bootstrap. You can find the source here. Based on Andrew Munsell's wonderful, though a bit oudated, tutorial.
